description: Land Acquisition - Order to acquire the land in Magamure & Gathaara, Kamburupitiya D/S Division, Matara District - Order to acquire the land in Ehala Karagahamuna, Mahara D/S Division, Gampaha District - Order to acquire the land in Kotigamgoda, Horana D/S Division, Kalutara District (S  only)
